description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and decentralized innovation. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics ranging from breaking down silos to keeping the web weird, reflecting his passion for fostering inclusive, innovative digital landscapes. Based in Taipei, he focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, merges academia and tech to revolutionize education and knowledge sharing. His work explores ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and decentralized innovation, aiming to create inclusive, innovative digital landscapes.
